Newton-Conover City Schools is excited to announce that USDA has approved the extension of the Summer Food Service Program (SFSP) until 12-31-2020. This will provide free meals (breakfast and lunch) to all students through December 2020.

Starting on Sept. 14 all hybrid students will be provided multiple meals (3 days of breakfast and lunch) that will be sent home with students on Tuesday or Thursday.

Full remote students can request a 5 day meal box that will be available for pick up only at Newton-Conover High School on Mondays from 10:45 - 11:30 or 2:00-2:45.

If you would like to receive a 5 day meal box, please sign up at the following link:
http://bit.ly/MultipleMealsforStudents
All 5 day boxes must be picked up at NCHS at the times listed above.

If your child was receiving free or reduced meal benefits last year, you must complete a new application for this 2019-20 school year by October 7, 2019. If you do not complete a new application, you will be required to pay the full price for your child's meals.

Full price is $1.25 for K-12 breakfast and $2.50 for K-5 lunch $2.75 for 6-12 lunch.

You may complete an online application at www.lunchapplication.com. You may also complete a paper application at our central office located at: 605 North Ashe Ave Newton, NC 28658

If you have already completed an application or received a letter of approval from Newton Conover City Schools, you do not need to complete another application. If you have any questions please contact our Child Nutrition Office at 828-464-3191.
